Articles.Content:
For those of you not in the American school system, our week-long spring break starts this Saturday!

What are you doing for break?

Yay next-week...

I am going to my grandmom in the country-side for a few days...

I\'m going to be in school.

QUARTER SYSTEM BABY!

The hell? I get 5 days off for easter, and you get a week? That\'s my entire Christmas break right there.

Fuck the school system.

The hell? I get 5 days off for easter, and you get a week? That\'s my entire Christmas break right there.

Fuck the school system.

That sucks...

Don\'t you have saturdays and sundays?
I have from Thursday to Monday off, dunno if that\'s correct. It\'s actually just 3 days off from school itself, but I try my best to be optimistic and count the weekend in between.

The hell? I get 5 days off for easter, and you get a week? That\'s my entire Christmas break right there.

Fuck the school system.

I get like 2 or 3 days off since I\'m home schooled.

Fuck my parents.

Damn Jews.

We get 2 weeks for Hannukah (which intercepts Christmas) and another two in spring for Passover (Which is near Easter.) This would be great except for the religious part.

Hannukah:

Pretty much okay, but it\'s annoying having to come down for prayer every night (which takes about 5 minutes) for eight days.

Passover:

Pure pain. No bread for 8 days (though we don\'t throw ours away, we just don\'t eat it), two seders in a row at my grandma\'s house, which are about 45 minutes long and then we have somewhat okay food. I fucking hate matzo and maror sandwiches! They taste like shit!

At least I don\'t fast yet. Ugh.

Damn Jews.

We get 2 weeks for Hannukah (which intercepts Christmas) and another two in spring for Passover (Which is near Easter.) This would be great except for the religious part.

Hannukah:

Pretty much okay, but it\'s annoying having to come down for prayer every night (which takes about 5 minutes) for eight days.

Passover:

Pure pain. No bread for 8 days (though we don\'t throw ours away, we just don\'t eat it), two seders in a row at my grandma\'s house, which are about 45 minutes long and then we have somewhat okay food. I fucking hate matzo and maror sandwiches! They taste like shit!

At least I don\'t fast yet. Ugh.

[/quote

That\'s nasty.

I hate religion... No... I hate that, that man has somehow invented(something) religion. Yeah, that\'s right, the fact that there is religion.

Grove

1. You just failed at quoting

2. You might want to shut up before you start something

Atheists *rolls eyes

I was going to devote my entire week to KSP, KSP Modeling, KSP Plugin Development and KSP rendevous, but then my mom was all like

'I\'m taking gram and gramps for pancakes sunday, wanna come?'

So Sunday is now

And then yesterday my boss at work (I work on campus) said

Boss: 'Oh yeah Spring Break, you can work full time over break instead of 20 hours a week if you want.'

Me: 'Oooo yaaaay....'

*boss leaves*

>_>

Dammit all.

Text to my gf.

Listen to music.

Go shopping.

Post this.

I\'m going to be in school.

^^^^^
